name: LoveGurubyLifeMAPP
0:
”Alexa, ask Love Guru for today's word”
”today's lesson”
”a random fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: love guru
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Love Guru by LifeMAPP. By simply asking, "Alexa, open Love Guru" or "Alexa, ask Love Guru for a random fact " you can access some of our life-changing lessons on relationships and love.

Be on the lookout for our next monthly update as we will be adding our "Direct Questions" feature from Parent Guru for lessons tailored specifically for your marriage or relationship needs!

Want some fun? Here are some "Easter eggs" hidden around our skill:
 • What is love?
 • Why do we need love?
 • Why do fools fall in love?
 • What's love got to do with it?
 • Who wrote the book of love?
 • How do I love thee?

Tweet @lifemapp if you have any fun ideas or needs you'd like to see grow in this Alexa skill and we'd be happy to review it as we add new content weekly.

We will be growing this Alexa Skill quickly (May 2017) to include new features that allow you to hear a lesson of the day and even ask Alexa direct questions about your relationship needs.

LifeMAPP is a global mentoring organization whose primary goal is to bring inspiration and beneficial change to the lives of those who seek to improve their surroundings and support.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
